rBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

res.rBody:
Dextram meam et collum meum
cinxit cinxi lapidibus pretiosis tradidit auribus meis inaestimabiles margaritas et circumdedit me vernantibus atque corus cantibus gemmis

vBody.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D

verses.vBody: Induit me dominus ciclade auro texta et immensis monilibus ornavit me
Posuit signum Posui signum in faciem meam ut nullum praeter eum amatorem admittam

rep.wit: CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L
